skills.skill: CDL A with Hazmat and Tanker endorsements

duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform Pre/Post trips on truck and obey traffic laws & hours of service rules per DOT
Load/unload totes, drums, & tanks on truck and lift and chain truck up when needed
Understand & complete all shipping paperwork and follow all company policies & procedures as written
Deliver product to unmanned locations and work flexible hours (i.e. holidays, weekends, etc)

education_certification.credential: Valid Class A CDL with Hazmat and Tanker endorsements
